text: 1:19 Onger Akaba 119:105; Jon 5:35Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e nɨghnɨzir gavgavimra Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akabar iti. Ezɨ ia uaghan men akabar suiragh gavgavigh, egh deragham. Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akaba mati lam mɨtatemɨn ikia isi moghɨn, Kraisɨn angazangarim ian navir averiabar aven ikɨ isiam. Arazir kam mati amɨnim itir mɨkovezim overiamɨn isitɨ, mɨtatem mangɨtɨ angazangarim otogham.1:19 Mɨzarazimɨn mɨkovezir kam, kar Krais Iesus. Nɨ Akar Mogomem 22:16ɨn gan.
